full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### [bid solicitation d'approvisionnement] W8485-237150/B

**Procurement Title**
Body Inflation Device (Dispositif de gonflage, corps)

**Reference Number**
PW-22-01012515

**Amendment Number**
1

**Publication Date**
2022-11-04

**Tender Closing Date**
2022-12-06T14:00:00

**Contracting Entity**
Department of National Defence (Ministère de la défense nationale)
101 Colonel By Dr,Ottawa,Ontario,K1A0K2,Canada

**Tender Description**

The Department of National Defence invites bids from interested suppliers for the procurement of Body Inflation Devices (Dispositifs de gonflage, corps) in accordance with this bid solicitation.

The Crown requires 600 units of the Body Inflation Device (Dispositif de gonflage, corps) as follows:

* Item 1: 200 units, to be delivered by 22 January, 2022
* Item 2: 200 units, to be delivered by 31 March, 2024
* Item 3: 200 units, to be delivered by 31 March, 2025

The items are detailed below:

| Item | NSN | Quantity | Delivery Date | Unit of Issue |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | 4220-21-896-6003 | 200 | 22 January, 2022 | EA |
| 2 | 4220-21-896-6003 | 200 | 31 March, 2024 | EA |
| 3 | 4220-21-896-6003 | 200 | 31 March, 2025 | EA |

Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Trade Agreements**

The following trade agreements apply to this procurement:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras
